page.title: 19Work of the Institute
page.content:
Continued
shows and courses are organised. The Institute publishes N.I.A.E. Reports on individual pieces of work, progress reports, translations, tractor test results and a period report. Many important changes in Agricultural Engineering result from the Institutes own research.
In l984 the N.I.A.E. received the Queen's Award for Technological Achievement for its work on grass conditioning. The mower-conditioner patent has earned the sixth largest licence income of the British Technology Group patent groups.
